ResourceHeader.Description: PEACE (Plasma Electron And Current Experiment) will count the population of low/medium energy electrons by measuring the number of electron impacts at each energy level and each direction. The Principal Investigator is A. Fazakerley, MSSL, Dorking, UK.

InformationURL.Name: NSSDC's Master Catalog
InformationURL.Description: Information about the Plasma Electron and Current Experiment (PEACE) experiment on the Double Star 2 mission.

Instrument.InvestigationName: Plasma Electron and Current Experiment (PEACE) on Double Star 2
